attributes.action: send those complicit in the practice of Rendition as admitted today (27/02/09) to the international war crimes tribunal in the Hague for breach of the Geneva Convention.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/we-did-hand-over-terror-suspects-for-rendition-hutton-admits-1633397.html

From todays Independent, John Hutton admitting our government handed over suspects for rendition. A practice which is against the Geneva Convention's standards for the ethical treatment of prisoners of war. Britain IS a signatory of the Geneva Convention and MUST hold to it at all times. Our government has admitted lying over this issue. Those responsible must be held to account.
